entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
